# .github/workflows/pipeline.yaml
name: CI/CD Pipeline Kubernetes Backend

on: 
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build_and_push:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      packages: write

    steps:
      - name: Checkout do código
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Login no GitHub Container Registry
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          registry: ghcr.io
          username: ${{ github.actor }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

      - name: Construir e publicar a imagem Docker
        run: |
          REPO_LOWERCASE=$(echo "${{ github.repository }}" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')
          
          IMAGE_TAG_SHA="ghcr.io/$REPO_LOWERCASE:${{ github.sha }}"
          IMAGE_TAG_LATEST="ghcr.io/$REPO_LOWERCASE:latest"

          docker build -t "$IMAGE_TAG_SHA" -t "$IMAGE_TAG_LATEST" .
          
          docker push "$IMAGE_TAG_SHA"
          docker push "$IMAGE_TAG_LATEST"

  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build_and_push

    steps:
      - name: Checkout do código
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Substituir a tag da imagem no arquivo de deploy
        run: |
          REPO_LOWERCASE=$(echo "${{ github.repository }}" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')
          IMAGE_NAME="ghcr.io/$REPO_LOWERCASE:${{ github.sha }}"
          
          sed -i "s|ghcr.io/ramoncbarbosa/logibot_backend:latest|$IMAGE_NAME|g" k8s/deployment.yaml
          
          echo "=== Conteúdo do deployment.yaml após substituição ==="
          cat k8s/deployment.yaml

      - name: Deploy no Cluster Kubernetes
        uses: actions-hub/kubectl@master
        env:
          KUBE_CONFIG: ${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}
        with:
          args: apply -f k8s/
